Uses of Interface
com.interface21.web.servlet.ThemeResolver

Packages that use ThemeResolver
com.interface21.web.servlet.support Support classes for Spring's web MVC framework.  
com.interface21.web.servlet.theme Theme support classes for Spring's web MVC framework.  
 

Uses of ThemeResolver in com.interface21.web.servlet.support
 

Methods in com.interface21.web.servlet.support that return ThemeResolver
static ThemeResolver RequestContextUtils.getThemeResolver(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          Return the ThemeResolver that has been bound to the request by the DispatcherServlet.
 

Uses of ThemeResolver in com.interface21.web.servlet.theme
 

Classes in com.interface21.web.servlet.theme that implement ThemeResolver
 class AbstractThemeResolver
          Abstract base class for ThemeResolver implementations.
 class CookieThemeResolver
          Implementation of ThemeResolver that uses a cookie sent back to the user in case of a custom setting, with a fallback to the fixed locale.
 class FixedThemeResolver
          Implementation of ThemeResolver that simply uses a fixed theme.
 class SessionThemeResolver
          Implementation of ThemeResolver that uses a theme attribute in the user's session in case of a custom setting, with a fallback to the fixed default theme.
